name: The Labyrinth (itch) (Etheric Studios)
description:
Welcome to The Maze !

The Labyrinth is a a reproduction of the Ball-in-a-Maze Puzzle game, directly inspired by the version featuring a wooden labyrinth tilted using two knobs, where the ball has to be navigated past a series of holes and obstacles.

Controlling a shiny green ball trapped in an artificial Maze that you can tilt as you please, you must move in order to find the exit and destroy its levels one by one, while avoiding the deadly red holes you will encounter in your path.

Dexterity, comprehension of the physics interactions and a good sense of direction will be necessary to carry out the mission entrusted to you...

Features

  • 20-40 minutes of playtime.
  • 15 abstract and unique levels.
  • Chill and Atmospheric musics by Purple Planet Music.
  • Level modding support.

Controls are explained in-game trough a tutorial!

Concerning the Linux version


The linux version was tested using a Ubuntu 18.x virtual machine:  as such its performances are not guaranteed. If you download this version, do not hesitate to give us your feedback in the comments session or by email.
